phrases: After spending the rest of Golden Week studying with Oga Kazuomi and Onoya An (Support Division), Kaizaki Arata passed his fourth round of make-up tests.
These make-ups are from a school far better than his actual ability, so this is impressive.
As I have written above, ReLIFE is fraught with trouble.
But each time Kaizaki Arata demonstrates remorse,
As I have written above, ReLIFE is fraught with trouble.
But each time Kaizaki Arata demonstrates remorse, and attempts to improve...
We have heard some disturbing rumors.
Specifically, that you are getting unnecessarily close to the subjects.
Have you forgotten you are only Support?
I know it is your first, and you want to rush things.
But that is no excuse for driving the subject into a corner with unwarranted advice.
You will undermine the ReLIFE process.
Have a good long think about your role here.
Decide who Yoake Ryo should be to subject no.
Naturally, we are already aware of that.
But that is not a problem I can solve.
The goal of ReLIFE is to give you experience.
To let you grow through your own thoughts and actions.
it will have no value as an experiment.
There is no need to rush things.
Asking for advice is, technically, a change.
But I cannot say for sure if it is a good sign.
I will maintain my distance and observe...
Yeah, yeah, I am about to send the report...
Sociable and helpful, but unable to get steady work.
But I guess that is not unusual late-night convenience store service.
Want me to warm that up?
Do you have a point card?
I thought I put it somewhere hard for him to spot.
A completely different type from subject no.
I want to be his support!
Are you trying to snatch him from me?
What did you think of him?
Seems like a good guy, huh?
Are we going to start him in the third year?
Looks like he will have no problems socially, so that would work fine.
And how are you doing with subject no.
Just the way the bosses want me to.
I am asking if the experiment will succeed or not...
We are talking about a human being here.
You never know what will happen.
What can you do to get results?
How far can you push things?
It is hard to find the right distance.
Our branch's first subject, and this is the result?
I am ashamed to show my face around the other branches.
A whole year without any change...
Did you not do enough to support the subject?
I have observed you for a year and reported on it.
But it seems like we will be unable to set you up with any work.
My support was not good enough.
They told me I was too involved.
Then they told me I did not do enough.
we received word that they have picked Kaizaki Arata-san as subject no.
Change of support for the start of the Kanto Branch's subject no.
They said to start prepping at once.
You do not have time to mope!
Onoya must be pissed at me.
She really wanted to support this test subject,
and I wound up snatching him anyway.
How did my life turn out like this?
Nice to meet you, Kaizaki Arata-san.
I am Yoake Ryo, from the ReLIFE Laboratory.
Will you become a student for a year and see this as a chance to change your life?
Or will you get cold feet, back out, and keep living as a NEET?
It was rough on you, right?
Pretending you had a real job in front of your friends.
If you are ready to accept,
Here is to a good ReLIFE.
What kind of ReLIFE will he show me?
You have got a lot of nerve making your senpai work like this, Onoya.
You were at the lab and coming here anyway,
so I figured you could bring it while you were at it.
It was too heavy and too far to bring while I was at it.
I will make some coffee as a thank you.
Support Division Onoya An Aoba High Uniform, Textbooks
My actual high school also had sailor uniforms.
Never thought I would wear one again at my age.
If I am an old bag, that makes you a geezer.
I am really looking forward to this!
I never imagined that starting April,
I would be in the same school
You met with him today, right?
Think you will work well with him?
That is our job as support.
Man, you really get on my nerves.
Well, you do not need to worry about Kaizaki-san.
We already made sure his personality would not be a problem.
I think people like that have problems that run deep.
The trauma of thinking you might have been the reason
that you lost someone you cared about
Was there more I could have done?
Perhaps I should not have done anything at all?
Now that he has no way of knowing for sure,
Kaizaki-san has lost confidence in his social skills.
Normally, he would go way out on a limb for someone, but...
But is not that what makes him perfect for ReLIFE?
ReLIFE will help Kaizaki-san get his confidence back.
You guys can do it together.
Onoya, you are really flattering me today.
I am just cheering you on!
What do you need this late?
I need to talk to you about something.
I let everyone know I would not see'them for a year, but...
But I cannot just call in to quit my job.
It will be a day or two, though.
Amagase-san, I have a medicine request.
You are here a lot lately.
One present and one past for subject no.
And one of each for you?
I will meet the subject to hand over the medicine,
so I would like to look my age.
I do not want him to see me like this
until I surprise him on the first day of school!
I cannot wait to see the look on his face!
Well, that is the official reason.
I just think if he knows the support will be in class with him,
he will not stress about it enough.
I will drop by tomorrow to pick them up.
It was just a part-time job.
Thanks for going along with this.
Now I can go back to school without any regrets.
You are just going to take it here?
Takes a while for it to kick in, right?
I do not have any other options.
I am just going to hunker down and let the year go by.
It is in the documents I gave you,
but you will get really sleepy shortly after taking that, so be careful.
I would advise you not to drive anywhere.
I do not have a car!
Is not it your fault for not explaining it to me properly?!
You should really read the documents.
But each time Kaizaki Arata demonstrates remorse,
He is starting to change things around him.
What effect will that have on Kaizaki Arata's ReLIFE?
It makes me want to keep watching
and living a student's life with them.
Yoake-san, what do you usually do?
I mean, what do you do when you are not supporting me?
I keep thinking about you, of course!
Is that what you want me to say?
